messages.speech: You can go for MIT as Manipal Institute of Technology was ranked 12th among engineering colleges in India by India Today in 2017,[25] 15 among engineering colleges by Outlook India in 2017 and 39 among engineering colleges by the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) in 2018.]It is recently awarded the prestigious Institute of Eminence(IOE) award 2018 by the Government of India and it is one among the only 2 private institutes to get this prestigious award. For more information about the colleges providing the course, you can visit- https://www.collegepravesh.com/engineering-colleges/mit-manipal/
